text: @funder @realdonaldtrump if there is anybody who I would like to get Covid19 & be LONG-TERM on a ventilator, it's xenophobic, racist Steven Miller - NOBODY deserves to be kept away from the seat of governance more - maybe he'd have to be treated by minority orderlies, etc. who he HATES!
